extensionDescription.message: View Markdown files with syntax highlighting and smart export tools

popup_version_label.description: Shows the extension version in the header

toolbar_toggle_toc_title.message: Show or hide table of contents
toolbar_toggle_toc_title.description: Toolbar button title for toggling TOC

toolbar_layout_title_normal.description: Toolbar layout toggle tooltip for normal mode

toolbar_layout_title_narrow.description: Toolbar layout toggle tooltip for narrow mode

toolbar_print_disabled_title.description: Tooltip when print button is disabled for remote files

async_processing_error.description: Generic error message with type and detail

docx_export_failed_default.description: Fallback message when DOCX export fails

docx_export_failed_alert.description: Alert shown when DOCX export fails

cache_error_message.message: Cache communication failed ‚Äî open a Markdown file first
cache_error_message.description: Shown when cache cannot be reached

cache_loading_failed.description: Displayed when cache loading throws an error

cache_hint_details.message: Caching runs automatically while Markdown pages are open
cache_hint_details.description: Additional hint when cache is empty

cache_system_unavailable.message: Cache system unavailable ‚Äî open a Markdown file first
cache_system_unavailable.description: Shown when cache manager cannot be reached

cache_manager_init_failed.description: Error string used when cache manager cannot initialize

cache_stat_item_label.description: Label for number of cached items

cache_items_empty.description: Shown when the cache list is empty

cache_item_created_label.description: Label for cache item created time

cache_item_accessed_label.description: Label for cache item last access time

cache_item_type_unknown.description: Fallback label when cache type is missing

cache_clear_confirm.message: Clear all cached data? This action cannot be undone.

settings_invalid_max_cache.message: Enter a valid cache size between {0} and {1}
settings_invalid_max_cache.description: Shown when max cache input is invalid

settings_reset_confirm.message: Reset all settings to default values?

demo_open_failed.description: Toast when demo link open fails

file_access_disabled.description: Status text when file access is disabled

file_access_disabled_desc_short.description: Short description prefix for file access warning

file_access_disabled_suffix.message: and enable 'Allow access to file URLs'

cache_manual_limit_desc_1.message: For security reasons the popup cannot access IndexedDB directly.

cache_manual_limit_desc_2.message: Caching still works while rendering Markdown pages, but the popup cannot display the details.

cache_manual_status_step_speed.message: Notice faster renders when cache is warm

cache_manual_status_step_console.message: Check for "‚ö° Using cached" logs in DevTools

cache_manual_clear_step_3.description: Manual cache clear step with code placeholder

settings_theme_changed.message: Theme changed successfully. Please reload the page to see the changes.
settings_theme_changed.description: Message shown when theme is changed

settings_language_note.message: Changing this overrides Chrome's UI language for the extension.

history_description.message: Shows recently opened Markdown documents, click to reopen

history_clear_confirm.message: Clear all history? This action cannot be undone.
